Occupation and Lifestyle: Jobs involving heavy lifting, prolonged standing
Formulation: Lodhra powder (½ tsp with honey)
Herbal Tea(Recommended): Shatavari-Rose tea (½ tsp Shatavari powder, dried rose petals, warm water)
Medical Intervention: Pessary device, surgery in severe cases
Recovery & Maintenance Tips: Avoid heavy lifting, strengthen pelvic muscles

Symptoms: Involuntary urine leakage, urgency, frequent urination, nocturia
Diagnosis & Tests: Urinalysis, bladder stress test, ultrasound
Medical History: Pregnancy, menopause, neurological disorders
Risk Factors: Aging, obesity, weak pelvic floor muscles
Formulation: Chandraprabha Vati (1 tablet daily)
Herbal Tea(Recommended): Gokshura-Punarnava tea ( ½ tsp Gokshura, ½ tsp Punarnava, warm water)
Medical Intervention: Pelvic therapy, surgery in severe cases

Symptoms: Irregular periods, weight gain, acne, excessive hair growth, insulin resistance
Diagnosis & Tests: Ultrasound, blood tests (hormonal levels, insulin, glucose)

Risk Factors: Genetics, insulin resistance, obesity
Occupation and Lifestyle: High stress and sedentary work affect condition
Formulation: 1 tsp fenugreek powder with warm water daily
Herbal Tea(Recommended): 1 tsp spearmint leaves + 1 cup hot water (steep for 10 mins)

Recovery & Maintenance Tips: Regular monitoring, balanced diet, stress reduction
